I was expecting to be better, as it is rated 4 stars In general terms it is a good hotel, but there are some serious problems to be taken in consideration. Good: - Comfortable bed - Good shower with a decent anti-slippery floor - Lots of staff usually helpful - Switchers to indicate do not disturb and clean the room - Nice view of the Jakarta financial district (only for rooms in the back of the building) Neutral: - Large breakfast, but most of the options are very exotic for a western person, that make the options very limited - Laundry service, but clothes are sent to outside service provider, that may take time Bad: - Crowded breakfast: the space is limited and frequently is full, sometimes completely crowded and you cannot have breakfast, unless you wait until near 10:00 AM. This is a very disgusting problem! - Many insects inside the rooms, a kind of fruit flies - Poor mini-bar, that cool just a little, and only if the AC of the room is working (otherwise is useless) - Poor central air conditioning, does not cool properly and lots of dust coming thru - Rooms have carpet, that make the room contaminated - Window does not open, making the contamination even worst - They rent the space for conferences and parties. Crowd and nosily! - Parties near-by, with loud music until late night in the back of the building, and a noisily avenue in the other side of the building - No free late check-out, even if you stay for weeks, they will charge you an extra night if you do checkout in the afternoon, that is abusive - Poor illumination in the rooms, with yellow lamps that make hard to simple things like to read a document - No preventive maintenance. It is only reactive. They are expecting that you will advise them about the room problems (poor AC, clog sink, ...). - The staff watch on what you do inside the room. I bought at the supermarket 2 large bottles of water and kept inside the mini-bar, but at the time of do checkout they tried to charge me - There is an attached restaurant, but they allow to smoke. A hell!

Hotel langganan keluarga. Setiap tahun paling gak sekali pasti nginap disini. Tapi entah kenapa sekarang rasanya agak aging dibandingkan dengan saat menginap terakhir. Booking dua kamar dengan connecting door di 1206 dan 1207. Saat pertama masuk kedalam kamar, kami disambut dengan hangat, secara harfiyah. Di 1206 sudah terpasang kartu untuk menyalakan listrik sejak awal, namun AC tidak dingin. Padahal thermostat AC udah dipentokin ke paling dingin dengan fan posisi 3 (maksimum). Bagian enginering dipanggil untuk mengatasi ini, tapi sepertinya hanya bisa menurunkan setengah derajat dari sebelumnya. Di kamar 1207 hasilnya agak lumayan, jadi kami terpaksa membuka terus connecting door untuk berbagi sejuk. Dan pada malam hari, anak bungsu saya yang terbiasa tidur dengan AC diset 22 derajat kesulitan tidur karena kepanasan di kamar 1206. Satu hal lain yang mengganggu yang saya sadari di kamar 1206 adalah terdapat kerenggangan antara frame pintu dengan dinding, yang memungkinkan kamar diintip dari luar. Untuk pengguna kamar berikutnya agar berhati-hati karena ada sedikit privacy issue. Dan pada kamar juga terdapat beberapa kerusakan (chip) pada furnitur serta ambalan diatas mini bar yang doyong, membuat kamar terlihat aging. Ada baiknya bagian maintenance memperhatikan ini. Untuk housekeeping tidak ada complain. Mereka mengerjakan tugasnya dengan baik. Kamar tetap bersih dan rapih, serta amennities tersedia. Diantara kekurang nyamanan itu, sarapan di restoran Kalandara adalah yang paling menyenangkan. Variasi menu dan rasa makanan masih enak seperti sebelumnya. Mereka bahkan menambahkan indomie station, dimana kita bisa memesan indomie goreng, indomie ayam bawang, dan indomie soto. Petugasnya sangat ramah terlihat antusias membuatkan indomie untuk tamu yang memesan. Disebelahnya juga disediakan kopi sachet, cofeemix, dan milo renceng untuk tamu yang lebih senang dengan minuman non-espresso. Yang tidak lagi bisa dijumpai disini hanya jamu (beras kencur dan kunyit asam), yang mungkin memang tidak banyak yang cari.

I was expecting to be better, as it is rated 4 stars In general terms it is a good hotel, but there are some serious problems to be taken in consideration. Good: - Comfortable bed - Good shower with a decent anti-slippery floor - Lots of staff usually helpful - Switchers to indicate do not disturb and clean the room - Nice view of the Jakarta financial district (only for rooms in the back of the building) Neutral: - Large breakfast, but most of the options are very exotic for a western person, that make the options very limited - Laundry service, but clothes are sent to outside service provider, that may take time Bad: - Crowded breakfast: the space is limited and frequently is full, sometimes completely crowded and you cannot have breakfast, unless you wait until near 10:00 AM.
